text: chamnek e chonhcheang vinh vea chea kammosetthi robsa ke m ng brosa kamprea pir neak nowknong tikrong noh . haey now pi kraom vea mean kamnbtropy robsa puokke teangpir . haey aupouk robsa ke teangpir chea mnoussa la troem trauv . haey mcheasa robsa anak mean bamnng aoy ke teangpir thom penhvy ning aoy ke teangpir yk kamnbtropy robsa puokke teangpir chenh daoy kei d me tda krounea pi mcheasa robsa anak . haey khnhom minban thveu vea tam te ampeu chetd robsakhnhom noh laey . noh haey kuchea kar bakasray champoh avei del anak min ach atthmot ban noh
